Name: Dungeon Adventure
About the game: Dungeon Adventure is a story about a bunch of adventurers trapped in a dungeon. The dark force gets stronger every door they pass. Unfortunately, they have no choice other than moving forward. The only way out for them is through. Featuring: - 5 trapped adventurers. - 20 customizable skills. - 19 merciless monsters. - 10 hand-crafted levels (includes more than 100+ fights). With special appearance of: - Gems - Consumables - Shops - Crafting - Frustration or sense of pride and accomplishment (depends on how good you are at the game) - Bugs
